content: Hey Ashley! I'm doing well, thanks for asking.  How's your day going?  Hope it's treating you kindly.
i want to tell you something i like. I LIKE TO FLY KITES!

Wow, Ashley!  Flying kites! That's awesome! I'm so glad you told me.  It sounds like so much fun. You know, I've always thought it looked really peaceful—watching them dance in the sky. What kind of kites do you fly?  I'd love to hear all about it!
